meta.Title: NAMES IN THE NEWS [New York Times, Sunday, March 24, 1946]
meta.Author: J. P. Downes

across.question: River in E. Siberia, 2,950 mi. to Arctic.
Admiral heading task force in Operation Crossroads.
What Lucullus did in a big way.

down.question: Chairman of House Military Affairs Committee.

River skiff of China and Japan.
Battleship to be used in atomic bomb test.
Group of tribes in Burma and Siam.
